The paragraph mentions "abnormally tortuous capillaries" which refers to the abnormal shape and structure of the capillaries in the lung mass and in the heavily hemosiderotic lung portions outside the mass.

Therefore, while not a chemical entity, "capillaries" are still relevant to the topic of the paragraph.
